	submarine_damage_control_hidden = 2
	encryption_machine_hidden = 1
	fleet_auxiliary_submarine_doctrine_hidden = 1
	trade_interdiction_submarine_doctrine_hidden = 1
	submarine_crew_training_hidden = 1
	faulty_torp_hidden = 0
	fixed_torp_hidden = 0
	long_lance_hidden = 0
}

	submarine_crew_berthing_hidden = 2

	submarine_battery_hidden = 2
	submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 2
	submarine_sonar_hidden = 2

	submarine_torpedo_hidden = 2
	torpedo_warhead_hidden = 2
	torpedo_targeting_hidden = 2
	torpedo_propulsion_hidden = 2
	submarine_fire_control_hidden = 2
	submarine_damage_control_hidden = 2
	encryption_machine_hidden = 1
	fleet_auxiliary_submarine_doctrine_hidden = 1
	trade_interdiction_submarine_doctrine_hidden = 1
	submarine_crew_training_hidden = 1

	fixed_torp_hidden = 0
	long_lance_hidden = 0

	submarine_crew_training_hidden = 1

	long_lance_hidden = 0

ger_xii_uboat.0 = { # ingame-model I 18 Type I

	submarine_class_hidden = 1
	streamlined_hull_hidden = 0

	submarine_hull_hidden = 1
	submarine_engine_hidden = 1

	submarine_torpedo_tubes_hidden = 1

	submarine_battery_hidden = 1
	torpedo_upgrade_hidden = 1
	submarine_torpedo_hidden = 1
	torpedo_warhead_hidden = 0
	torpedo_targeting_hidden = 0
	torpedo_propulsion_hidden = 0
	submarine_fire_control_hidden = 0
	submarine_damage_control_hidden = 0
	electric_powered_torpedo_hidden = 0
	submarine_snorkel_hidden = 0
	submarine_electroboat_hidden = 0
	milch_submarine_hidden = 0
	naval_HQ_tech_hidden = 0

	active_sonar_sub_hidden = 0
	submarine_crew_training_hidden = 0
	faulty_torp_hidden = 0
	fixed_torp_hidden = 0
	long_lance_hidden = 0
}

	long_lance_hidden = 0

	torpedo_warhead_hidden = 2
	torpedo_targeting_hidden = 2
	torpedo_propulsion_hidden = 2
	submarine_fire_control_hidden = 2
	submarine_damage_control_hidden = 2
	encryption_machine_hidden = 1
	fleet_auxiliary_submarine_doctrine_hidden = 1
	trade_interdiction_submarine_doctrine_hidden = 1
	submarine_crew_training_hidden = 1
	faulty_torp_hidden = 0
	fixed_torp_hidden = 0
	long_lance_hidden = 0
}

	submarine_class_hidden = 3
	streamlined_hull_hidden = 0
	# Starting techs to reduce upgrade IC at startup

	submarine_engine_hidden = 2
	submarine_crew_berthing_hidden = 2
	submarine_torpedo_tubes_hidden = 2
	submarine_periscope_hidden = 2

	long_lance_hidden = 0
}
